title: Ranked Ranking System is FLAWED
body: So last season on my Main account I was Bronze 4 due to playing poorly then never playing ranked again. This season after improving significantly I won 6 and lost 4 out of my provisional games and was placed once again in Bronze 4. Now I have a 2nd account in which I just did my provisional games and I won 4 and lost 6 and was placed in Silver 5 which is strange because I won less and lost more than on my main account. Rectify this please. I tried to escape from Bronze on my main and went from Bronze 4 to Bronze 1 in 2 days. Recently got demoted back to Bronze 2 because my teams don't know how to play.

replies.body: You had lower mmr last season so it makes it harder to climb the next season.
